blogPost.excerpt: MeetingBar shows your calendar events in the status bar. Create and join meetings with one click. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ No data or personal information collection. The app is entirely free and powered by an open-source community. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Works with 30+ meeting services.
blogPost.body: MeetingBar shows your calendar events in the status bar. Create and join meetings with one click. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ No data or personal information collection. The app is entirely free and powered by an open-source community. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Works with 30+ meeting services.
blogPost.title: MeetingBar 3.0 - Meetings before your eyes
blogPost.author: Andrii Leitisus

localize.description: 会议栏在状态栏中显示你的日历事件。一键创建和加入会议。无数据或个人信息收集。该应用完全免费，由开源社区提供技术支持。
會議欄在狀態欄中顯示你的日曆事件。一鍵創建和加入會議。無數據或個人信息收集。該應用完全免費，由開源社區提供技術支持。

previous.excerpt: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
previous.title: Remote - Remote empowers companies to employ global teams compliantly

localize.description: Remote使各种规模的公司都能雇佣全球团队。我们负责处理国际薪资、福利、税收和合规性问题，因此您可以专注于发展您的业务。
localize.tagline: 远程化使企业能够合规地雇佣全球团队。

localize.description: Remote使各種規模的公司都能僱傭全球團隊。我們負責處理國際薪資、福利、稅收和合規性問題，因此您可以專注於發展您的業務。
localize.tagline: 遠程化使企業能夠合規地僱傭全球團隊。

next.excerpt: Enhance your Notion pages with automatically updating date icons for: - today - yesterday - tomorrow - last/this/next week - last/this/next quarter - last/this/next month - last/this/next year
next.title: Dynamic Calendar Icons for Notion - Add automatically updating date icons to your Notion

localize.description: 使用自动更新的日期图标来增强您的Notion页面。- 今天 - 昨天 - 明天 - 上周/本周/下周 - 上季度/本季度/下季度 - 上月/本月/下月 - 上年/本年/下年。
localize.tagline: 为您的Notion添加自动更新的日期图标。

localize.description: 使用自動更新的日期圖標來增強您的Notion頁面。- 今天 - 昨天 - 明天 - 上週/本週/下週 - 上季度/本季度/下季度 - 上月/本月/下月 - 上年/本年/下年。
localize.tagline: 爲您的Notion添加自動更新的日期圖標。
